name: Crystal Cavern (Lowcase)
description:
My learning project for Unreal Engine 4 based on Unreal Engine Blueprint Developer: Learn Visual Scripting Udemy course.

Controls

  • Keyboard - arrows or WASD
  • Gamepad

Objective

  • Activate the portal by collecting all crystals and go through it to the next level
  • Don't fall from the platforms
  • Don't get hit by a cannonball
  • Complete all levels

Credits

  • Music: bensound.com
  • Icons & Sounds: kenney.nl
